website_summaries.verdict: A reasonably priced model with occasional quality and longevity issues.
pros: Starts regardless of temperature or weather thanks to exceptional starting burst when engine is cranked
cons: A few reports of failed battery life after about a year
Some consumers received batteries that wouldn't hold a charge

customer_reviews.title: Cars been fine since.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in Feb 2015. Performed flawlessly for exactly one year. Now it will only keep/maintain a charge of 10.54 volts which isn't enough to start my SLK. Seems it was bested by our mildly cold New Orleans winter. Swapped it out with a cheapo 'SuperStart' from my garage. Cars been fine since. Figured I'd play the odds purchasing from Amazon even though I read the reviews stating that they would NOT honor the warranty. I lost.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: It didn't even last two years...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in April 2014. January 2016 and the first real cold snap and it's dead. I left nothing turned on and there are no accessories to drain the battery. It has been slowly crapping out as the last few times I started my car, it barely started. The electrical system is OK (alternator, etc). Just dissappointed. I guess I will be trying out an Odyssey.
customer_reviews.author: Jack B. Brunson Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Best battery ever
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I'm 67 years old and have bought many batteries in my life. The Optima is a different animal, in a great way. My vehicle monitors battery use and charging and the norm is, after cranking the car, it took 5 or more miles of driving to replace what was drawn out of the battery reserve. The Optima will fully recharge after about 100 yards, or less than 1/4 mile. I will not be buying anything other than Optima from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Her Dawdaw

customer_reviews.title: Warranty is not worth anything when purchased online.
customer_reviews.text: Poor performance, optima had always been on battery tender when not in use but slowly started losing its power capacity after 1st year. Optima is useless after 2 1/2 years and come to find out the warranty is a joke. I will never buy a battery through Amazon again. Pay a little extra from your local auto parts store and be protected when problems arise.
customer_reviews.author: K. Y.

customer_reviews.title: No warranty and it is much needed as these things go bad in a short period of time!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these batteries exactly 8mos ago and one of them for sure had gone bad on me if not both. I was a big fan of these batteries prior to reading how Amazon doesn't cover you on the warranty!! Pretty messed up considering the price you pay for these things.
customer_reviews.author: Matt olson

customer_reviews.title: Favorite car battery.
customer_reviews.text: Best car batteries around. They last long in the heat, never leak or spill, nothing to maintain. Best feature about them is that you can notice when they start to go bad. Normal lead-acid batteries just seem to die all of sudden with no warning. The Optima seems like it gives you a warning. My car will begin starting hard and I know its time to replace the battery.
customer_reviews.author: M. Speck

customer_reviews.title: Powerfull little thing; great battary
customer_reviews.text: I have had this on my Audi B7 A4 Quattro for over a year and has been working wonders. I might be do for a small recharge as i have noticed it doesn't instantly start my car as it did when i first installed. But think that is my fault for leaving the lights on or while charging stuff while the car is off. Although this battery is technically not meant for my car it has been working great. I decided to get this as it is light weight compared to stock.
customer_reviews.author: OMJesus

customer_reviews.title: Install was an absolute breeze and the performance it perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great batteries as i have previously owned them so when the factory one in my truck went out I already knew where to go and what to get. While Optima doesn't technically have a battery specifically for my vehicle, just call them and they can help you figure out which one should fit and not have to go the custom route - have done this on 2 different vehicles. Install was an absolute breeze and the performance it perfect. Highly recommend this battery or company to anyone and everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Lamar

customer_reviews.title: Totally dead!!
customer_reviews.text: We have had the battery for a little over a year. It is in out 1972 VW Bus It was great for about the first 6 month and now it only registers 6 volts and wont recharge. There are no battery drains in the vehicle and it runs and operates great.Buying it on Amazon, I have no idea if the warranty is good but the return end date was 1 month after purchase. For a battery that cost over $200 it is not worth it at all. I suggest buying straight from the company if you want any kind of simple warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Hartwell

customer_reviews.title: Purchased as a replacement battery for a 2008 Smart ForTwo. Works much better than the original
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a replacement battery for a 2008 Smart ForTwo. Works much better than the original; even brand new, the headlights used to perceptibly dim and brighten as voltage fluctuated in the system, and now it doesn't anymore. Not an exact fit replacement, but the posts are in the right place and I didn't have to make any major modifications to drop it in. Been running it for about 6 months now, still happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Working fine for me so far.  Installation takes extra work
customer_reviews.text: This is my third Optima Red Top battery purchase. In theory the design is superior and more resistant to vibration damage. Some reviewers had quality issues. At 6 months I have no complaints and trust these will meet longevity promised by advertising so that the higher price is justified. The smaller footprint and height make installation more difficult than standard size battery. I had to put spacers under battery hold down clamps on the 4runner. It took about 1 hour extra work.
customer_reviews.author: Hi Desert Richard

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Great batteries! I used them on 2009 GMC Sierra/ Duramax, the passenger side battery fit perfectly. The driver side (and this is original battery cables) did not fit as well. The posts on the optimas are closer to center on the top panel of the battery making the reach of the original cables that angle 90degrees downward over the side a little challenging.
customer_reviews.author: romerofp

customer_reviews.title: I unboxed a new red top and charge was approx 3v! Wouldn't hold a charge!
customer_reviews.text: I installed the battery to weeks ago, it will not hold a charge. Not even a year old! Amazon tells me that I need to deal with the manufacturer for warranty issues. Optima tells me I must deal with Amazon. No clear RMA process, the customer is left hanging. Buyer beware! As far as the Optima battery quality, I have always used Optima batteries on all of my vehicles and I have to say, the last two units I have purchased have had quality issues. I have used the optima charger to tender the batteries and the older ones were better quality. This is the last time I purchase an optima battery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: An extremely powerful battery that does not fail.
customer_reviews.text: This Optima battery is everything that it purports to be and more. I installed it with ease and it started a car that had not been started for six months! In an instant. I was very pleased and surprised. Cranking power on demand! I highly recommend this powerhouse of a battery.
customer_reviews.author: J. Heller

customer_reviews.title: Optima 34R red top
customer_reviews.text: Optima (maybe all brands?) batteries always ship fast so that's a plus. Slowly switching all the cars over to these as they have served the full length of any cars I've possessed so one less thing to worry about. I don't always hook up to a floater even though i should but haven't had issues starting after a couple weeks of sitting. Of course i normally do hook up to a charger/floater. I'll update if this one fails to meet the same standards. New in box with adaptor plate (size 48, 65 and 78) with full charge.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: This is the second optima I've bought. Both crapped ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second optima I've bought. Both crapped out within three years. Optima tells me their 3 year warranty must be taken care of by Amazon. Right. Go ahead, buy an Optima. Do you feel lucky today?
customer_reviews.author: G. Maltby

customer_reviews.title: The Best Replacement Battery For Audi B7 S4
customer_reviews.text: This battery is a perfect upgrade for your Audi B7 S4. Don't pay attention to the fitment configurator on Amazon, it will work for the S4. We live in Minnesota and after installing this battery in the middle of the winter our car had much better crank, even after multiple nights of freezing weather. Couldn't be happier with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: MattLyzToriEnzo

customer_reviews.title: You will be stuck if it fails!
customer_reviews.text: Died after less than 3 years. The listing makes you believe Amazon will handle the warranty claim but you get the run around and end up getting redirected to Optima. My advice: if you’re set on buying this battery DONT BUY IT FROM Amazon. Buy it local where they’ll give you a replacement. I’m told it’ll take a week or two for me to get the warranty claim processed and I have to pay for shipping. All the while my car is unusable!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Barthel

customer_reviews.title: Only worked 1 year
customer_reviews.text: I bought this battery April 7th, 2017 put into a 2012 standard Factory Jeep. At the end of November 2018 it is dead and I have to jump start it over and over... in my 25 years of driving Jeeps had I ever had an issue with a battery such as this.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit the vehicles it is described as fitting.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely does not fit a 2012 Chevy Tahoe despite what the guide says. They do not take returns, so I had to dispose of a brand new, very expensive battery. Never. Again. Avoid Optima at all costs.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: 34R with the included hold down adapter fits perfectly in 07-13 Chevy Silverado's.
customer_reviews.text: Shipped quickly and with a fresh date - only about a month old. Included the requisite group 48 hold down adapter needed for my application. Installed easily. Charge seemed good - measured 12.7V on the bench before installing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Battery - Great Selection
customer_reviews.text: I have a weird/adorable Smart car. When the battery died all the auto sales people just laughed at me. Found this one on amazon and not only is it exactly what I need, but it was much less expensive than the ones at Auto Zone or wherever. I use amazon for clothes and trinkets and such. Never even thought of buying car parts on here. Now this is the first place I look!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great battery, shipped fast, fit perfect in Lexus RX330
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a replacement to the stock battery in my Lexus RX330, it fit perfectly and starts the SUV even in our cold subzero days like a champ. I totally recommend this battery vs paying retail at a dealership. Installation was quick and simple, the battery came boxed well and protected with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: AlexLop

customer_reviews.title: This is a great battery, and I'd have given 5 stars but ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great battery, and I'd have given 5 stars but they sold me one that's already 7 months old!! This battery is going in an old Corvette that requires removal of the front wheel and a panel to install. It's a bitch and that's why i bought this brand of battery...don't want to do it over, so getting an "old" battery really ticks me off. steve meltzer
customer_reviews.author: S. Meltzer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I just got done installing the battery in my 2002 Ford Taurus. I went to start the car and it fired right up. The adapters which came with the battery worked perfectly. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Arnold Kwiatkowski

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT order this battery
customer_reviews.text: I got two of them back in Feb and had several problems with no help from Amazon. First the sale said group 34 but they sent me 34R (reverse terminal) batteries and i had to install longer battery cables to get them to fit. Second the batteries were dead on delivery. Now 2 1/2 months later both batteries are not fully charging. Amazon will not take the return and tells you to call Optima and Optima will not take them because Amazon is not an authorized retailer. In the long run I am spending far more than just buying them from my local auto parts store.
customer_reviews.author: BKE

customer_reviews.title: It died and AMAZON came through like a champ with a replacement without hassles
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wife's car to replace a 6 year old OPTIMA from AutoZone. It died and AMAZON came through like a champ with a replacement without hassles. Actually easier that local battery purchase where you have to take it in to test etc before they give a PROrated replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Optima Batteries 8003-151 34R
customer_reviews.text: Always great quality from Optima! I highly recommend this battery when you need a strong and powerful battery.
customer_reviews.author: Backup

customer_reviews.title: Best Battery Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love Optima batteries. They are reliable and always last much longer than expected. (years)
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Cline

customer_reviews.title: Dead w/no warranty after ONE month of use! Unacceptable!!
customer_reviews.text: Delivered 2/8/19, will not turn the vehicle over or hold a charge on 3/13. Lasted just over a month, and there is no warranty on these purchased through Amazon. What happened? These batteries were top of the line 15 years ago. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Riccardi

customer_reviews.title: Optima makes good batteries and this is onr of them
customer_reviews.text: This is really good battery for the price. I bought this for my Toyota Rav 2006 sport and even tho it says it wont fit but I knew it will. I measure my current battery and found that this will work just fine. Now for the performance I only had it for 2 weeks but its going strong and some people complaining about shipping, mine came all well. I have posted the Picture for other to see.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Best batt for the price
customer_reviews.text: I use nothing but Optima batteries. However this battery was not a direct replacement for my 2014 chevy Pickup had to do some fabrication in order to get it to fit.. that said its way better then my factory battery. Even though it was half the size of factory batt
customer_reviews.author: Kiva Watkins

customer_reviews.title: New batteries usually work fine. These are supposed to be better than average ...
customer_reviews.text: New batteries usually work fine. These are supposed to be better than average and are constructed differently to resist normal stresses. Time will tell. It was easy to install with a built in removable handle and comes with different hold down options. the Amazon price made it worth the wait as "normal' batteries were in the same price range.
customer_reviews.author: Edward E. Betty Jr.

customer_reviews.title: They LAST!
customer_reviews.text: These batteries are great! They last so long, you don’t even remember where you bought them when it’s time for another. Had my truck since 1997 (22 yrs) and replaced original battery with an optima red top when it was time, and now I’m only on my second red top and that one is going strong into 2020.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Alt Gina Alt

customer_reviews.title: Great batteries.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Trickle charged it up to full capacity before installing it. Brackets that it came with made for a nice installation as the battery is much smaller than the factory one in the 2012 jeep jk.
customer_reviews.author: Johnathon

customer_reviews.title: decent battery but can't return if you buy from amazon ...
customer_reviews.text: decent battery but can't return if you buy from amazon. worth to spend extra money and go to local auto store and be able to use the optima warranty
customer_reviews.author: TRMP

customer_reviews.title: Best cold cranking i have ever had in my life!
customer_reviews.text: Best battery you will ever buy!!! Even after sitting in subzero weather for days.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Optima Batteries at their best
customer_reviews.text: A larger fit than the original but it works and starts every time needed.
customer_reviews.author: sdhco

customer_reviews.title: ... red top on multiple vehicle platforms with the same great results for over 20 years
customer_reviews.text: I have used the red top on multiple vehicle platforms with the same great results for over 20 years. Sports cars, 4WD, monster trucks & the Jeepasourus. They never get the verdigris on the posts and have starting amps second to none. Currently have it installed in a 2012 Genesis GT 380 with the TRACK PKG.
customer_reviews.author: Busychild

customer_reviews.title: Poor product
customer_reviews.text: Car turned over twice then nothing. Tried to charge and would not take a charge
customer_reviews.author: Robert M Carroll

customer_reviews.title: how do you get this battery warrantied when it fails?
customer_reviews.text: This battery failed on me and I have no info on how to move forward on replacing it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just like previous cheapo OEM battery
customer_reviews.text: Overpriced. Last only 5 years. Just like previous cheapo OEM battery.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wu

customer_reviews.title: Optima 34R RedTop Battery 2003 MINI app
customer_reviews.text: I installed the 34R on my 2003 MINI Cooper S. It took a bit of creativity to make the battery hold-down work. The supplied adapters were not usable for this car. The terminal connectors had to be spread to fit the battery posts. I have a special set of pliers for that, but you probably don't!The installation was straightforward, but not a drop-in. The battery has amazing cranking ability! With the battery in the back of the car and a long cable run, that's important. Overall, I'm happy with the battery.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas W. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Did not arrived charged
customer_reviews.text: Arrived undercharged. I had to purchase a battery charger to get it back to 100%.
customer_reviews.author: sean

customer_reviews.title: Other reviews bogus!! Packaging amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: Looking at many reviews was skeptical but ordered anyway. Was very impressed came in original factory package with everything needed!!! Great product. Only down fall is not full charged. But who knows how long it sits on shelfs. I installed and put on charge anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: worth the price
customer_reviews.text: We've bought these for all our vehicles. They just don't die.
customer_reviews.author: KansasKate

customer_reviews.title: Battery works great the only issue I have is the mounting hardware ...
customer_reviews.text: I received the batter 3 days after I placed the order. Battery works great the only issue I have is the mounting hardware doesn't really fit my 2009 GMC Sierra. I did modify the battery tray so that the battery lock held a little better. All in all the red tops are great batterys and the price was amazing.
customer_reviews.author: jimmy wood

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: what can i say dry cell optima. dont know why all batteries are not following suit
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best batteries that I found to last longer.
customer_reviews.text: The batteries are better then conventional batteries and last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy E.

customer_reviews.title: Very good product.
customer_reviews.text: The best car batteries made! This fit my 2012 vw tiguan with a slight modification to the positive cable. No sweat. It mad a big difference when starting. No more panic with old battery.
customer_reviews.author: pat

customer_reviews.title: DOES work in VW mk3 vehicles
customer_reviews.text: It states not fitting in a VW mk3 vehicle, but it literally fits perfect. Should have bought a YellowTop for my sound system and will next time, but for now this battery works perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Manly

customer_reviews.title: Working great in '09 Mini Cooper S
customer_reviews.text: I got one of these as a replacement for the stock battery in my '09 Mini Cooper S. It fit great and has been working like a charm for 3 months now. The price on Amazon was about $50 less than the local auto parts store too. I would definitely recommend this battery over an expensive OEM Mini replacement any day.
customer_reviews.author: Ian C

customer_reviews.title: Died after 13 months
customer_reviews.text: Bad cell. Had to replace after 13 months as engine stopped cranking.
customer_reviews.author: glassmj

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS FROM AMAZON!
customer_reviews.text: Amazon is not an authorized dealer for Optima! Optima will not honor the warranty, and Amazon will not stand behind this product either. Amazon is being very dishonest by selling this battery knowing there is NO warranty. Mine died after two years (into the three year replacement warranty) and Amazon will not do a single thing to stand behind the purchase. What else on this site isn't Amazon telling you doesn't have a warranty? I have been a loyal Amazon/Prime customer for years, but not after getting off the phone with Amazon about this battery. It maybe a little more expensive to buy local, but I just learned my lesson that it is really cheaper in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: Shredward

customer_reviews.title: ... of these in my previous car and it worked great even in -20f
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these in my previous car and it worked great even in -20f. After I sold that car, I didn't hesitate to upgrade the new car to this battery as well. My cars are much more enthusiastic about starting in january.
customer_reviews.author: Justin T.

customer_reviews.title: wonderful battery i have been using it for a while ...
customer_reviews.text: wonderful battery i have been using it for a while now and i am amazed of how it works i have a music system in my van and the battery turns on my alarm and everything turns on okay with this battery i love it and i have no regret
customer_reviews.author: divi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good so far Have had this for 10 months now and it has been 100% dependable.
customer_reviews.author: J Adams

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the premium paid.
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the premium paid. My battery was well maintained in a classic car having regular use and never once abused or discharged. It now is holding a charge of 11.7 volts only 2 months past its warranty. I gave it 2 stars since it never gave me trouble, but not sure it really earns them based on its price. I expected more, but I guess I’ll just head to Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Greg S

customer_reviews.title: I’m surprised amazon would associate themselves with such a bad company.
customer_reviews.text: So after about 7 months of use this battery is dead. I really thought I bought something that would last. I’m surprised amazon would associate themselves with such a bad company.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing so far
customer_reviews.text: Amazing so far. Fitment was easy to figure out for my 07 Silverado. Not sure why gm put on angled post connectors on the battery cables. I had to bent the positive connector so that it would work..
customer_reviews.author: ifishinxs

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Buy on an Optima Battery
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a Smart replacement. Top notch battery at a super price. Local shops wanted more for an ordinary battery. This should outlast the car.
customer_reviews.author: RSVP

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: they are great batteries, have used them for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Butch44

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: The battery came two days early and its been a great addition to my muscle car. It is the only battery I have ever owned that my car can't drag down with all my compression and torque. I would recommend to anyone who needs a good battery to definitely go with Optima, it will not let you down. GREAT PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Darrell L.Dunivan

customer_reviews.title: Well made Gell Cell
customer_reviews.text: I have had the battery for about 2months and I am pleased with it. The size Amazon recommended did fit well on my toyota with the supplied shims. The casing appears very strong and rather unique compared to other gell cell I was considering. I would have update this review 7 years from now to give it the 5 stars if there were no long term problems.
customer_reviews.author: RoyM2

customer_reviews.title: JUNK!
customer_reviews.text: Garbage battery left me stranded on 1000 mile road trip 3 months after purchase, had to take a tow truck to the nearest advance auto and buy a new battery, very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money, longevity sucks
customer_reviews.text: This battery was purchased on 9/2019 and needed to be replaced on April 10, 2020. It was not holding a charge. I hope the seller sees this and refunds my money.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen J.

customer_reviews.title: ... battery in my Diesel chevy truck and its is awesome. I am now a Optima Battery buyer for ...
customer_reviews.text: Put this battery in my Diesel chevy truck and its is awesome. I am now a Optima Battery buyer for life.
customer_reviews.author: Joe from bothell

customer_reviews.title: Great deal !
customer_reviews.text: Product and service as expected. Saved big $$ over parts stores plus no core charge.
customer_reviews.author: D. S.

customer_reviews.title: The one that showed up looked like it was just pulled out of a car
customer_reviews.text: I'm waiting for a replacement battery,. The one that showed up looked like it was just pulled out of a car. Not sure what happened but hope the replacement is a new battery
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: all I can say is thank you to Amazon and for the the great customer service solutions does
customer_reviews.text: well ,,, all I can say is thank you to Amazon and for the the great customer service solutions does,, although,, this time was my fault,, sorry and thanks one more time. Amazon is a Unique and Awesome company
customer_reviews.author: esteban rodas

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Battery, Arrived Quickly
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Battery, Arrived Quickly, Perfect Fit and Cranking Power is Great. Easy to install and arrived with all the appropriate components to install easily and quickly. Also got the Best Price on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby

customer_reviews.title: ... but I didn't know that the warranty wouldn't be good unless I purchase from a brick and mortar store
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had any problems but I didn't know that the warranty wouldn't be good unless I purchase from a brick and mortar store.
customer_reviews.author: Darin

customer_reviews.title: Not much CCA or CA. Doesn't seem to be ...
customer_reviews.text: Not much CCA or CA. Doesn't seem to be that strong in the winter. It holds a charge but will not last longer than the lead acid battery that precedes it.
customer_reviews.author: Cale

customer_reviews.title: very nice product, as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Can't complaint....very nice product, as advertised... I would buy again without hesitation A++++
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: These batteries are the greatest. I have two of them
customer_reviews.text: These batteries are the greatest. I have two of them. One I'm my motorhome and one in my Jeep Wrangler. Both of them have performed flawlessly. I highly recommend the Optima batteries.
customer_reviews.author: R. A. Jorgensen

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than OEM Bigger on POWER!
customer_reviews.text: Seeing as this battery is 25lbs lighter than the factory Audi battery I expected it to be less powerful..I was wrong. OPTIMA is much more powerful and I only did the change for the weight savings (my OEM battery was fine). Car starts much faster than before, 5 stars and I've had it for 4 months!
customer_reviews.author: Hobbyzone

customer_reviews.title: Superior quality battery at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Superior quality battery at a good price. Ensure to keep a battery conditioner on it if not being used for a few days or weeks.
customer_reviews.author: CPO USN Retired

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: More cranking amps than standard batteries and lasts a lot longer.
customer_reviews.author: nicholas becker

customer_reviews.title: The worst
customer_reviews.text: I bought this battery two years ago........Yesterday it was replaced at my dealership for $300. It had completely died, cooked, no longer able to hold a charge. TWO YEARS OLD!
customer_reviews.author: Peter Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Mustang replacement battery
customer_reviews.text: It does fit a 2013 Boss 302. Just needed slight bend on positive factory wire. No problem with install despite optima saying no battery they have fits. That's why.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This fits well in my 2003 Mini Cooper S. ...
customer_reviews.text: This fits well in my 2003 Mini Cooper S. I've had this battery for over three and a half years now and have never had an issue with it. Cranks the car over quickly, even on the coldest winter mornings.
customer_reviews.author: matty s.

customer_reviews.title: Nothing but the best
customer_reviews.text: If you've got more than just a stock stereo, and need reliability for multiple screens, a booming setup and keeping your ride juiced without sluggishly starting cause of the pull, get one of these bad boys.
customer_reviews.author: W.Michael Wilson

customer_reviews.title: DOA
customer_reviews.text: Was dead on arrival, never fired up the vehicle. Had it towed and mechanic confirmed battery was dead.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in battery wont hold a charge less than 3 years old.
customer_reviews.text: Batter is less than 3 years old and will not hold a charge. Very disappointed. I am going to have to replace this battery.
customer_reviews.author: Joe White

customer_reviews.title: Although this is not the recommended battery for my car
customer_reviews.text: Although this is not the recommended battery for my car ... this is excellent and I have not had a major problem, I just only add a base so that it could be secured well with the screw in my mini cooper 2007.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the extra $
customer_reviews.text: I tried an Optima Red Top with high hopes of getting at least 5-6 years out of it. Well, try 3 1/2 years and no pro-rated warranty. No extra battery load, just standard equipment. Was maintained with a trickle charge as they recommend on their web site. The batteries futuristically good looks are misleading; as the overall performance was surprisingly a disappointment. Perhaps the technologies will improve in the future, but for now... you won't get what you pay for with Optima.. :(
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: Installed in my 2013 Jeep Wrangler. Great product so far. Not sure about the longevity yet.
customer_reviews.author: jason johnson

customer_reviews.title: Best Batteries ever
customer_reviews.text: I will never buy another battery that is not an Optima. My father stole my last battery I bought in 1997. He currently has it in a piece of farming equipment that survives over 100 degree temperatures and below zero temperatures. Also the equipment is used 4 times a year so it doesn't even have a maintenance charge during its down time. If you know anything about batteries, one year in those conditions should have killed it dead. And a battery that has survived 16 years of service from 3 different vehicles sounds impossible. I wouldn't believe it if I hadn't done it myself.
customer_reviews.author: Bender

customer_reviews.title: Arrived well packaged and ready to work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a 2009 Pontiac G8, but the terminals are too inward - but the smaller one fits. So I put this in my 09 Sierra 1500 with a 6.2 - Hopefully it lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Holsworth

customer_reviews.title: Great package all around!
customer_reviews.text: Great packaging on these, for a safe delivery. Great product. Would recommend the Optima to anyone. The best price I could find at the time and haven't seen any better to date.
customer_reviews.author: D. A. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Battery didn't fit the application properly.
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered the battery the dimensions were the same as my original battery in the truck, Not sure what happened but the battery is too short? I needed to put a piece of wood on the battery so the hold down would hold the battery secure.
customer_reviews.author: greenriverlyle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very strong and got it For a steal!!!! Wont buy another brand again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Cottrell

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in Optima batteries.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 8/16 used for a patriot gat opener on my home, failed 9/19. Would not hold a charge from a Smart battery charger, 3 rd optima battery to fail in less than 3.5 years of use
customer_reviews.author: Top Sarge

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great deal, fast shipping on the best battery you can buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mark K

customer_reviews.title: 1st one lasted me longer than 5 years - how ...
customer_reviews.text: 1st one lasted me longer than 5 years - how could I not get it again? Has never let me down.
customer_reviews.author: LPL

customer_reviews.title: Two out of Two failed-
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these batteries and both failed after two years. Amazon won't take it back and Optima will mess with you until you give up. They aren't cheap either. EDIT 3/4/11 Optima finally sent me a new battery and told me to dispose of the old one so even though I don't like the batteries, they do honor their warranty. I called Optima direct for this.
customer_reviews.author: Jungatheart

customer_reviews.text: -50 did not freeze, great cranking in cold weather (Duramax 2500 GMC)
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Great battery!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great battery at a great price. Delivered to my door. Starts my GMC Yukon better than when the truck was new.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas W. Mason

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: worked great as expected. definately would recommend an purchase again .
customer_reviews.author: ron

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. Put it in an '08 Smart Passion and it was a tight fit. Didn't require any modifications thankfully.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Kozler

product_meta.title: Optima Batteries 8003-151 34R RedTop Starting Battery
product_meta.description: Product Packaging:Standard PackagingOptima 34R RedTop is designed to deliver high power cranking ability even in harsh weather conditions. This battery is great for heavy use by hot rods and off-roaders with its leak-proof, high power, and starting ability. The unique SpiralCell design provides a strong and clean power source, ensuring the safety of you, your family and the environment. The higher reserve capacity gives you a longer shelf-life to give you the power when you need it, where you need it.
feature_bullets: 12-Volt, 800 Cold Cranking Amps, Size: 10" x 6 7/8" x 7 13/16" tall, Weight: 37.9 pounds, SAE Post
Reserve capacity of 100 minutes for constant performance
Optimal starting power even in bad weather. Internal Resistance:0.003
Fifteen times more resistant to vibration for durability
